The project is based on the original concept by Martin Boy, Anja Kammer, Timo Neumann, Laura Seidler.

Thank you!

headline: Revised Concept and Implementation
text: Cristina Beltran Ramos, Veronika Babic, Lina Kriebel, Vivian Zaddach, Simon Binder, Mario Sch√ºtz: Lawyer Dude - A learning unit on using images from the internet without going to jail supported by Wikimedia Deutschland e.V. headline: Disclaimer
text:
No legal advice!

This tool is designed to facilitate the compliant re-use of certain copyright-protected images. However, it can never cover all use cases and characteristics, and thus cannot replace qualified legal advice by a lawyer.
